title: SGC Graded T3s For Sale - Mostly HOF
author: T206.org

posts.post_title: SGC Graded T3s For Sale - Mostly HOF
posts.post_content:
I'm brokering these cards from the recent North Carolina find. To note, the gentleman that owns the collection will be the payee, by money order or cashiers check only, and he will also handle the shipping (w/ insurance included), although I completely stand behind any transaction(s).

Emails have priority: [url]trae@t206.org[/url]
Offers welcome.

Prices and scans here:
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/ncfind/t3-turkey-reds[/url]
Trae, when you're back I'll take Mr. Joss. Email me the information and payment is on the way.
3 left! Bump for price reductions. Offers welcome!
